item.description:
ã€

Building Custom Producers with Elixir's Broadway

23 Oct 2025 by samullen

A practical guide to building custom Broadway producers in Elixir using GenStage. Understand how demand works, how to prevent your pipeline from stalling, and how to use Process.send_after/3 to keep data flowing between your producer and Broadway consumer.

https://samuelmullen.com/articles/building-custom-producers-with-elixirs-broadway

item.description:
ã€

You don't need an ORM â€“ type-safe SQL in Gleam

22 Oct 2025 by ancatrusc

Tired of ORMs hiding SQL? @giacomo_cava shows how Squirrel generates type-safe code from raw SQL at Code BEAM Europe. No type-wrangling. No schema drift. Just SQL with full type-safety. Get your ticket to CBE https://codebeameurope.com/talks/you-don-t-need-an-orm/

item.description:
ã€

Thinking Elixir 275: From Slop to Success?

21 Oct 2025 by brainlid

Episode 275 of Thinking Elixir. News includes the release of Elixir v1.19.0-rc.2 with impressive deps compile times and optimized set-theoretic type checking, a timeline update on typed structs arriving by next year, the new â€œmix help app:phoenixâ€ command for building AI Agent context, gRPC library v0.11.0 with client load balancing, ReqCassette for recording test requests, German Velascoâ€™s video walkthrough of Phoenixâ€™s AGENTS.md file, Brian Cardarellaâ€™s insights on the influx of AI-generated codebases needing rescue, Elixir Observerâ€™s major updates with categories and semantic search, Chris McCordâ€™s demonstration of isolated AI coding sandboxes on Fly Machines, NPMâ€™s new security changes for token management, and more!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YCDskB8Wb74

NATS at Industrial Scale

21 Oct 2025 by ancatrusc

Schaeffler built a NATS mesh across 100+ plants handling billions of messages daily. Jean-Noel Moyne & Max Arndt are showing how at MQ Summit: â†’ No firewalls to open â†’ 50+ apps on one backbone â†’ Production-proven edge architecture https://mqsummit.com/

How I switched from Ruby to Elixir by building my own product

16 Oct 2025 by avdept

Iâ€™ve been using Ruby on Rails for over decade but never had a chance to try Elixir. In this article I describe how I learned it by building my own product, my findings and path https://medium.com/@alexsinelnikov/how-i-switched-from-ruby-to-elixir-and-to-learn-it-better-built-a-product-154661c9fb4a

item.title: ã€A starter Phoenix LiveView project adapted to Fluxon UIã€‘é€‚åˆ Fluxon UI çš„ Phoenix LiveView å…¥é—¨é¡¹ç›®
item.description:
ã€

A starter Phoenix LiveView project adapted to Fluxon UI

15 Oct 2025 by svenvc

Fluxon UI is a commercial collection of web UI components for Phoenix LiveView projects. Though there is great documentation I missed an example starter project to help in converting to it. I created such a project, named fluxonui_first, to have something that works out of the box and to show the detailed steps that led to it.

https://blog.stfx.eu/2025-10-15-fluxon-ui-first.html

item.title: ã€Thinking Elixir 274: Protocols, Permissions, and Performanceã€‘Thinking Elixir 274ï¼šåè®®ã€æƒé™å’Œæ€§èƒ½
item.description:
ã€

Thinking Elixir 274: Protocols, Permissions, and Performance

14 Oct 2025 by brainlid

Episode 274 of Thinking Elixir. News includes the release of Elixir 1.19.0-rc.1 with OTP 28.1+ compatibility and impressive 2.3x faster dependency compilation, JetBrains adopting the open Agent Client Protocol for AI coding agents, an update on LiveView Nativeâ€™s uncertain future, major improvements to the MDex Markdown library including streaming support and Quill delta conversion, Curiosumâ€™s comprehensive blog post on their Permit authorization library, Elixir gaining an AT Protocol library called Aether for Bluesky integration, Supabase raising $100 million at a $5 billion valuation while building on Elixir, Ruby community fracturing over gem server ownership controversies, security concerns about AI agents escalating privileges across systems, and more!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ox1Y5xuoGDc

View on ElixirStatus
ã€‘<è¡¨æ ¼å®½åº¦=â€œ100%â€è¾¹æ¡†=â€œ0â€>

Think Elixir 274ï¼šåè®®ã€æƒé™å’Œæ€§èƒ½

<å­—ä½“é¢œè‰²=â€œ#aaaâ€> <å­—ä½“é¢œè‰²=â€œ#aaaâ€> 2025 å¹´ 10 æœˆ 14 æ—¥ <å­—ä½“é¢œè‰²=â€œ#aaaâ€> ç»è¿‡ Brainlid <å­—ä½“é¢œè‰²=â€œ#aaaâ€>

Thinking Elixir ç¬¬ 274 é›†ã€‚æ–°é—»åŒ…æ‹¬å‘å¸ƒå…·æœ‰ OTP 28.1+ å…¼å®¹æ€§å’Œä»¤äººå°è±¡æ·±åˆ»çš„ 2.3 å€æ›´å¿«çš„ä¾èµ–ç¼–è¯‘é€Ÿåº¦çš„ Elixir 1.19.0-rc.1ã€JetBrains é‡‡ç”¨ç”¨äº AI ç¼–ç ä»£ç†çš„å¼€æ”¾ä»£ç†å®¢æˆ·ç«¯åè®®ã€LiveView Native ä¸ç¡®å®šçš„æœªæ¥çš„æ›´æ–°ã€MDex Markdown åº“çš„é‡å¤§æ”¹è¿›ï¼ˆåŒ…æ‹¬æµæ”¯æŒå’Œ Quill delta è½¬æ¢ï¼‰ã€Curiosum å…³äºå…¶ Permit æˆæƒåº“çš„ç»¼åˆåšå®¢æ–‡ç« ã€Elixir è·å¾— AT åè®® åä¸º Aether çš„ Bluesky é›†æˆåº“ã€Supabase åœ¨ Elixir çš„åŸºç¡€ä¸Šä»¥ 50 äº¿ç¾å…ƒçš„ä¼°å€¼ç­¹é›†äº† 1 äº¿ç¾å…ƒã€Ruby ç¤¾åŒºå›  gem æœåŠ¡å™¨æ‰€æœ‰æƒäº‰è®®ã€AI ä»£ç†è·¨ç³»ç»Ÿå‡çº§æƒé™çš„å®‰å…¨æ‹…å¿§ç­‰ç­‰è€Œç ´è£‚ï¼

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ox1Y5xuoGDc

<å°æ—¶> åœ¨ ElixirStatus ä¸ŠæŸ¥çœ‹
